Patients undergo medical adrenalectomy use hydrocortisone combine aminoglutethimide OR ketoconazole . Oral hydrocortisone administer twice daily . Oral aminoglutethimide administer twice daily 1 week 4 time daily subsequent week . Oral ketoconazole administer three time daily .
